title: Cris Collinsworth on Social Justice + Lincoln Riley on Communication with his Team
itunes:title: Cris Collinsworth on Social Justice + Lincoln Riley on Communication with his Team
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys are joined by NBC's color commentator and PFF's Cris Collinsworth as he talks about social justice, athletic quarterbacks and much more (6:58). Then, the pair give their takeaways from the interview (35:08). To wrap up the show, the duo speak with Oklahoma head football coach Lincoln Riley about his communication with his team with everything going on in the world and Riley also discusses his mentors (41:34).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
